title: Re-add Engine.OM.UnitTests assembly
body:
This assembly hasn't been building because it was left out of src\MSBuild.sln in master.  It was building in xplat, but that caused build breaks when the xunit conversion merged in (because it wasn't converted to xunit).

This assembly should
1. Be added to the solution and to `src\dirs.proj` so that it builds all the time.
2. Be converted to xunit.
3. Have its tests automatically run.

In both master and xplat.

nodes.body: Fixed in xplat and master as of #307.
